mapper.select: /* kr.happyjob.study.employee.dao.TaApplyDao.taApplylist */ select ui.total_rest ,sum(ifnull(atd.rest_day,0)) as use_rest ,(ui.total_rest - sum(ifnull(atd.rest_day,0))) as remain_rest from tb_userinfo ui left outer join tb_atd_info atd on atd.loginID = ui.loginID and atd.atd_yn = "y" where ui.loginID = #{loginId};

/* kr.happyjob.study.employee.dao.TaApplyDao.rest_info */ select det.detail_name as dept_name ,ui.name ,ui.emp_no ,ui.hp from tb_userinfo ui inner join tb_detail_code det on ui.dept_cd = det.detail_code and det.group_code = "dept_cd" where ui.loginID = #{loginId}

/* kr.happyjob.study.employee.dao.TaApplyDao.rest_reject_rsn */ select atd.atd_name ,atd.reject_rsn ,atd.atd_no from tb_atd_info atd inner join tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = atd.loginID where atd.atd_no = #{atd_no}
